channel.title: Comments on: Ground Bison & Vegetable Stew

item.title: By: Anne Laury
item.dc:creator: Anne Laury
item.description: Made this stu & loved it. I also added a couple of different spices, such as, curry, nutmeg, garam malasa. Also didn’t have sweet white potatoes, so used yams. Flavours with bison are amazing.. Thank you
item.content:encoded:
Made this stu & loved it. I also added a couple of different spices, such as, curry, nutmeg, garam malasa. Also didn’t have sweet white potatoes, so used yams.
Flavours with bison are amazing..
Thank you

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ground-bison-vegetable-stew/#comment-506">Wai-Yee Chan</a>.
Thank you so much for leaving a review! Bison is definitely one of my favorites - great to hear you enjoyed it as well.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Wai-Yee Chan.

Thank you so much for leaving a review! Bison is definitely one of my favorites – great to hear you enjoyed it as well.

item.title: By: Wai-Yee Chan
item.dc:creator: Wai-Yee Chan
item.description: Thank you - this stew was delicious - first time I’ve ever had bison & thought it would be gamey but it wasn’t. Only thing is that my stew was not as bright yellow as yours - mine looked more in the muddier side.
item.content:encoded: Thank you – this stew was delicious – first time I’ve ever had bison & thought it would be gamey but it wasn’t. Only thing is that my stew was not as bright yellow as yours – mine looked more in the muddier side.

item.title: By: Rebecca
item.dc:creator: Rebecca
item.description: Just made this tonight. Just as written but sans parsley. It’s definitely a two thumbs up on my thumb - o - meter! A keeper for sure. All at the table agreed. Thank you!
item.content:encoded: Just made this tonight. Just as written but sans parsley. It’s definitely a two thumbs up on my thumb – o – meter! A keeper for sure. All at the table agreed. Thank you!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ground-bison-vegetable-stew/#comment-492">Rebecca</a>.
Hi Rebecca, I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed the bison stew! Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Rebecca.

Hi Rebecca, I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed the bison stew! Thank you for taking the time to leave your review.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ground-bison-vegetable-stew/#comment-469">Tricia B.</a>.
Thanks Tricia! So happy to hear you enjoyed the stew - it is one of my favorite go-to recipes, especially during the winter. Thank you for sharing!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Tricia B..

Thanks Tricia! So happy to hear you enjoyed the stew – it is one of my favorite go-to recipes, especially during the winter. Thank you for sharing!

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ground-bison-vegetable-stew/#comment-468">Anne</a>.
Hi Anne, thank you for taking the time to leave a review! I am so happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe and that you have something new to add to your rotation of meals.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Anne.

Hi Anne, thank you for taking the time to leave a review! I am so happy to hear you enjoyed the recipe and that you have something new to add to your rotation of meals.

item.title: By: Tricia B.
item.dc:creator: Tricia B.
item.description: Loved this soup!!!! It was amazing! I could not find puréed butternut squash, but bought a package of chopped squash in the vegetable section, boiled it and smashed it. Thank you for sharing! It was perfect for tonight’s cold weather!
item.content:encoded: Loved this soup!!!! It was amazing! I could not find puréed butternut squash, but bought a package of chopped squash in the vegetable section, boiled it and smashed it. Thank you for sharing! It was perfect for tonight’s cold weather!

item.title: By: Anne
item.dc:creator: Anne
item.description: Thank you for this recipe. I have a severe food sensitivity problem and am limited in what I can eat. I get tired of the same old things. I made this with slight modifications and loved it. It was so nice to have something different.
item.content:encoded: Thank you for this recipe. I have a severe food sensitivity problem and am limited in what I can eat. I get tired of the same old things. I made this with slight modifications and loved it. It was so nice to have something different.

item.title: By: Stephanie
item.dc:creator: Stephanie
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/ground-bison-vegetable-stew/#comment-392">C.Mamo Kim</a>.
Sounds absolutely delicious! So happy to hear you enjoyed the stew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to C.Mamo Kim.

Sounds absolutely delicious! So happy to hear you enjoyed the stew.
